    public class Process
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • allocate_seats

        public int[] allocate_seats​(java.lang.String[] party_names,
                            java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> party_ballots,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> cand_ballots,
                            int num_ballots,
                            int num_seats,
                            java.lang.String auditfile)
        This method calculate how many seats are supposed to be assigned to each party based on their votes and total number of seats
        Parameters:
        party_names - all parties' name
        party_ballots - each party votes received corresponds to their party name
        cand_ballots - In each party, their candidates' votes received corresponds to their names
        num_ballots - total ballots
        num_seats - total seats
        auditfile - the auditfile name , by default: "audit.txt"
        Returns:
        number of seats assigned for each party

      • display_results

        public void display_results​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> results,
                            java.lang.String[] party_names,
                            int num_seats)
        This method display the winners in a table on the screen. The results will include: candidate name, their party, and their ballots received or their rank in party.
        Parameters:
        results - This winner results should include winners'name and their votes. The index of hashtable corresponds to their party.
        party_names - This party names should include all the parties' names.
        num_seats - total seats
